summary: A boy is given a ring by an old witch. He uses the ring along with a magic Christmas tree which grants him 3 wishes.
cast: Chris Kroesen|Valerie Hobbs|Darlene Lohnes|Richard C. Parish|Bill Willingham|Billy Schaffner|Robert 'Big Buck' Maffei|Dianne Johnson|Blanche Mickelson|Howard Blevins|Terry Bradshaw|Charles Nix|Ichabod|Lucifer|James Crocker|Nedra|Louise Scott|Herbert Elfman
title: Magic Christmas Tree
